headline: PG&E (PCG) Valuation Check as Shares Lag Behind Growing Earnings
summary: PG&E (PCG) has been grinding lower in recent weeks, with the stock down around 8% over the past month and roughly 24% year to date, even as earnings and revenue continue to grow. See our latest analysis for PG&E. At around $15.16 a share, PG&E’s weak year to date share price return sits awkwardly next to solid earnings growth. This suggests investors are still cautious about regulatory and execution risks, even as the 90 day share price return has turned positive. If PG&E’s recent volatility...
